name: CHHapticEvent
desc: An object that describes a single haptic or audio event.

items.name: var type: CHHapticEvent.EventType
items.desc: The type of the haptic event.

items.name: struct CHHapticEvent.EventType
items.desc: The types of audio and haptic event waveforms.

items.name: init(audioResourceID: CHHapticAudioResourceID, parameters: [CHHapticEventParameter], relativeTime: TimeInterval)
items.desc: Initializes a haptic event from a previously loaded audio resource, specifying event parameters and start time.

items.name: init(audioResourceID: CHHapticAudioResourceID, parameters: [CHHapticEventParameter], relativeTime: TimeInterval, duration: TimeInterval)
items.desc: Initializes a haptic event from a previously loaded audio resource, specifying event parameters, start time, and duration.

items.name: init(eventType: CHHapticEvent.EventType, parameters: [CHHapticEventParameter], relativeTime: TimeInterval)
items.desc: Initializes a haptic event of the specified type, parameters, and start time.

items.name: init(eventType: CHHapticEvent.EventType, parameters: [CHHapticEventParameter], relativeTime: TimeInterval, duration: TimeInterval)
items.desc: Initializes a haptic event of the specified type, parameters, start time, and duration.

items.name: var eventParameters: [CHHapticEventParameter]
items.desc: An array of event parameters, possibly empty.

items.name: struct CHHapticEvent.ParameterID
items.desc: An identifier for an event parameter.

items.name: var relativeTime: TimeInterval
items.desc: The start time of the event, relative to other events in the same pattern.

items.name: var duration: TimeInterval
items.desc: The duration of the haptic event.
